posts.name: Fedor Indutny
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.44.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • Stickers should feel sticky, not stuck, so now you can click on a sticker on a newly linked Signal Desktop and that sticker download will automatically get prioritized even when other attachments are downloading too.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.44.0-beta.1…v7.45.0-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

Thanks for being a beta tester!

New Version: 7.45.0-beta.1

34 new commits since 7.44.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.45.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Bump electron from 34.1.1 to 34.2.0 [2]

  • Make link-and-sync downloads resumable [3]

  • Prevent element resize when timeline is scroll-locked [4]

  • Support system name fields & upgrade libsignal [5]

  • Pass proxy down to libsignal Net instance [6]

  • Use libsignal Net without proxy on rejection [7]

  • Fix call animation from speaker to grid view so animating speaker is on top [8]

  • Avoid errant scroll on context menu hide [9]

  • Use pnpm [10]

  • Use pnpm in reproducible builds [11]

  • Update release notes [12]

  • Update strings [13]

  • Update DNS fallback [14]

  • Use --frozen-lockfile in reproducible builds [15]

  • Fix linux CI in main [16]

  • Support dynamic import with preload cache [17]

  • Update apt in CI if install fails [18]

  • Retry SQL query on successful FTS5 recovery [19]

  • Fix thumbnail when forwarding visual media [20]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.50.0 [21]

  • Don't allow device naming when linking without syncing [22]

  • Update to RingRTC v2.50.1 [23]

  • Improve Processing of Sync Tasks [24]

  • Require X-Signal-Timestamp header on all storage/group server 403 responses [25]

  • Cache ~/.electron-gyp in CI [26]

  • Improve recovery from corrupted downloads [27]

  • Improve handling of edited long message attachments [28]

  • Prioritize sticker downloads initiated from UI [29]

  • Use ms-winsoundevent:Notification.IM on Windows [30]

  • Fix flaky test [31]

  • Release notes for 7.45 [32]

  • Update strings [33]

  • 7.45.0-beta.1 [34]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Desktop v7.44.0-beta.1…v7.45.0-beta.1

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Desktop 7.44 release

posts.cooked:
On Windows 11 (24H2), running Signal v7.45.0-beta.1, with my system language (“Windows display language”) set as en-GB as primary, with pt-PT as a second option, Signal is picking pt-PT as as its UI language, when it should be selecting en (per language preferences UI).

When I pick English in the language preferences, Signal restarts to show the UI in English correctly. Reverting to “System language” picks pt-PT once again, despite the language picker UI correctly showing “English”.

Example UI screenshot:

signal-7_45_0_beta1_system_language_settings686×693 36.7 KB

Debug log: https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.45.0-beta.1/212225dc10559723d9bf60912f3570c1ec8c7cd53d84a72bd640d0203baf07f5.gz

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
Downloading an attachment consistently fails on Desktop:

image331×177 26.9 KB

image340×171 25.2 KB

Message timestamp: 1741015800210

Every time the download proceeds till the end but in the end the download restarts:
https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.45.0-beta.1/35168820bce61e5642bf64ad3f7eb7fd2a93c2a622d2d4a3a5b43ad917f5c513.gz

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked: Thanks for the report; I see the bug! We’ll try to get a fix out in this week’s releases.
